sentence: — Max Miller (@MaxMillerOH) April 6, 2022 The court is planning to hold a hearing on the new congressional map sometime after the May 3 primary, and is hearing challenges to a fourth set of state legislative maps.
title: Bob Gibbs, House Republican Facing Primary Challenge in Ohio, Will Retire

sentence: If he had not exited the primary race, Gibbs would have went up against Trump-backed challenger Max Miller, who was an aide to the former president.
author: Kaylyn Hlavaty
title: Ohio Rep. Bob Gibbs announces retirement over 'circus' of Ohio's unresolved congressional maps

sentence: But Gibbs' most significant obstacle to a seventh term was former Trump White House and campaign aide Max Miller, one of several other candidates who filed for the May 3 primary.
title: Rep. Bob Gibbs of Ohio, facing Trump-backed challenger, announces retirement

sentence: To that end, after considerable deliberation, I have decided to not seek re-election this year.” Gibbs was also facing Max Miller, a former aide to former President Donald Trump, in the Republican primary.
author: Clare Foran and Melissa Holzberg DePalo
title: Ohio GOP lawmaker announces retirement citing redistricting ‘circus’

sentence: Gibbs’ expected primary opponent is Max Miller, a former aide to Donald Trump.
author: Jazz Shaw
title: Ohio Republican announces retirement over redistricting

sentence: Around 12 percent of his old district remained in the new one.” “Gibbs also faced primary challenges from several candidates including Max Miller, a well-funded former White House aide to ex-President Donald Trump.” Save to Favorites
author: Taegan Goddard
title: GOP Lawmaker to Retire Rather Than Face Primary

sentence: Gibbs announced in November that he planned to run for reelection, but the six-term congressman released a statement Wednesday morning saying the slow-moving redistricting “circus” he blames on the court led him to the “difficult decision” to “not seek re-election this year.” “It is irresponsible to effectively confirm the congressional map for this election cycle seven days before voting begins,” Gibbs wrote, “especially in the Seventh Congressional District where almost 90 percent of the electorate is new and nearly two thirds is an area primarily from another district, foreign to any expectations or connection to the current Seventh District.” The redrawn, Republican-favoring district would have pitted Gibbs against GOP primary candidates that include Max Miller, a former White House and campaign aide to Donald Trump who the former president has already endorsed.
author: Ben Orner
title: Ohio’s Bob Gibbs, citing redistricting ‘circus,’ is retiring from Congress

sentence: The current new Congressional map drew Gibbs into a primary with Max Miller, a former aide in the Trump White House.
author: Amy Eddings
title: Morning Headlines: Cleveland moves to expunge 4,000 low-level marijuana offenses...and more stories

sentence: He’ll certainly stump for U.S. House candidate Max Miller, his pick for the 7th Congressional District, and perhaps for U.S. Senate or governor choices he’s yet to make.
title: Trump returns to Ohio for GOP rally ahead of May 3 primary
